title: Cebu City Olympics: UC, ANS locked in tight race for overall medal lead
summary: CEBU CITY, Philippines — The University of Cebu (UC) Webmasters and Abellana National School (ANS/Unit 9) are battling neck-and-neck for the top spot in the secondary division of the 33rd Cebu City Olympics medal tally. title: Mandaue City Library set to reopen in early December 2025
summary: MANDAUE CITY, Cebu — Mandaue City’s Electronic Library is set to open next week, providing access to high school and college students for research and printing, Mayor Thadeo Jovito “Jonkie” Ouano announced. The library, located in the Rizal-Bonifacio Memorial Building in Heritage Plaza, will receive an additional 15 units to complement its existing 21 computer workstations. The new units just need to be installed as soon as the ongoing renovations are completed.
